snippet: One may judge of the real state of the finances in Turkey by the decision which the Government has just announced, that not only no more brilliants are to be given with the orders, but that all those already bestowed are to be taken back. It is la...
lead_paragraph: One may judge of the real state of the finances in Turkey by the decision which the Government has just announced, that not only no more brilliants are to be given with the orders, but that all those already bestowed are to be taken back. It is lamentable to see a Government reduced to such expedients.

headline.main: Condition and Prospects of Turkey.; From The London Morning Chronicle.
